column4: When I do "dmesg | grep fglrx" I can see a error: "[17179608.748000]  [fglrx:firegl_unlock]  *ERROR* Process 4607 using kernel contex" Anyone know what this means?
I don't know :P Ubuntu is working fine, but 3d dosn't work. Mesa driver is activated, not ati
have you installed the fglrx driver?
so you installed the one from the repos?
I used the terminal to install.
so something like apt-get install xorg-driver-fglrx?
run this in a terminal: grep Driver /etc/X11/xorg.conf | tail -1
yes it's a looong time since I did that guide
try the forum.  i recall seing a troubleshooting thread on the mesa issue there
Ok, I see if I can find it
you have the link to the fglrx issue in forum?
this is the one i saw: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=143283&highlight=ati+mesa
